src.loader.LoaderInterface module¶

class src.loader.LoaderInterface.LoaderInterface(config)[source]¶

Bases: src.main.Module.Module

Configuration:

_set_properties(objects: [<class 'bpy_types.Object'>])[source]¶

Sets all custom properties of all given objects according to the configuration.

Also runs all custom property functions.

Parameters:objects – A list of objects which should receive the custom properties. Type: [bpy.types.Object]
static change_shading_mode(objects: [<class 'bpy_types.Object'>], mode: str)[source]¶

Changes the shading mode of all objects to either flat or smooth. All surfaces of that object are changed.

Parameters:
  • objects – A list of objects which should receive the custom properties. Type: [bpy.types.Object]
  • mode – Desired mode of the shading. Available: [“FLAT”, “SMOOTH”]. Type: str
